created_at.description: The creation date and time of the entity.

updated_at.description: The last updated date and time of the entity.

directory_uid.description: The license directory unique identifier. Will determine which directory can sell this package. Null means Available to all directories.

product_unique_code.description: The related underlying product unique identifier (app code name, package code...).

type.description:
The type of the directory package. It can be plan - for the business's main subscription; app - for a marketplace app subscription; 
 one_time_purchase - for consumables; staff_seat - for additional seats for the business.

active.description: Indicates that new subscriptions can be created only when this directory package is active.
